articles.title: People who participated in Covid vaccine trials will get CoWin certificates: Health ministry - India Today
articles.description: According to the Union Health Ministry, persons who participated in Covid-19 vaccine trials and were given a vaccine rather than a placebo would be covered under CoWin, and certificates will be sent to them.
